#summary Introducing Micro Lua
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The project MicroLua is an homebrew for Nintendo DS which allows you to launch [LuaLink Lua] scripts. Tens of functions have been added to Lua 5.1.3 source code. This allow you to easily create applications and games on your favorite console.

= History =

MicroLua was originally created by Risike.

MicroLua became open on the 9th of July, 2009. Then the community begun to work on this Google Code project around October the same year.
